channel.title: Easter Eggs
channel.description:
This thread is to post funny easter eggs.
Easter eggs are undocumented stuff in programs, or anything strange in a program that was put in secretly.
Google has a few, such as: Type this into google: answer to life the universe and everything(No it's not a google bomb. This was actually put in by google) The answer comes out to 42, by the google calculator.
Another is with flash 8. On the loading screen, there is a secret button that will take you somewhere with flash games.
Mozilla firefox has it's own built in bible :P Type in: about:mozilla (type it in firefox) If you do it in IE, you get a blank blue screen.
Solitaire also has a force win, although I forget what to press.
Easter eggs can be found in OS's, games, software, anything. Do you guys have any to share?

item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Basically it's using lots of servers to link to websites using keywords.

Or as always, wikipedia can explain it nicely: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google_bomb

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Eggs
item.dc:creator: @motherload11 motherload11
item.description:
@motherload11 wrote:

Yeah I just watchd that episode!
Dam I need to watch the first one again so I can find niblers head

"we are long and (something) poopers!"

In SSX3 I forgot what level but there are 3 easter eggs (real easter eggs lol) you can go through em too!

IN THUG (tony hawks underground) go to the school leven and make sure your in park mode or whatever mode that lets you see from a birds eye view. Go to the place where you spawn and you can see a basketball hoop and some objects!

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Eggs
item.dc:creator: @cow821 cow821
item.description:
@cow821 wrote:

Pigons on google
http://www.google.com/technology/pigeonrank.html
Real eggs on google http://www.google.com/Easter/feature_easter.html
on the monster inc dvd
1. On the second disc, go to the door marked "Humans Only".
2. Go to the door at the top left corner of the screen.
3. There should be an option called "PIXAR animation studio tour."
4. Highlight the Monsters Inc. logo at the bottom, it will be black.
5. Press left. There will be a black circle around the airplane.
6. You really know you're there when the the guy that comes on says, "Hi! You've found our little easter egg!"
Cool xbox backround egg
1. Play a music disc in your Xbox like normal.
2. While it is playing press the X and Y buttons.
3. The little design that was in the corner will now take up the whole screen.
4. To get out of it just press the buttons again.

Read full topic
